sections.heading: Overview
content:
Alexander C. Sanger, MBA, JD, has served as the president of Planned
Parenthood of New York City and its international arm, The Margaret Sanger
Center International, since 1991. In 1994, he lectured at both the United
Nations International Conference on Population and Development in Cairo, Egypt,
and the United Nations Fourth World Conference on Women at Beijing. He was
named "One of the Most Influential People on the Planet" in 1995 by Earth Times .
